name: Geriatric Hard Road
description:
Geriatric Hard Road is a game that tries to raise awareness about architectonic accessibility for people with disabilities.

Help the elderly get to the bus fixing the obstacles in their way. But be carefull of not waste resources on reforns not nedded or you will recive a penalty.

This game was made in 48h in the IV Game Jam Máster GamesUpm with the theme: Disabled people. It was the second winner of the Jam.
